name: Goosewind
description:
I'm excited to share my first semi-complete game, Goosewind! Soar the skies and honk the tornadoes out of your path! Play in browser or download for Windows (Mac coming soon). There may be a few small updates here and there. I'm a hobbyist game developer and this is a practice project for me. It's small, but I hope you enjoy!

Controls
  • Move: Left and Right Arrow Keys
  • Honk: Up Arrow Key
Notes for Downloads
  • On Windows, after extracting the .zip folder, be sure the .exe and .pck files are in the same folder/directory.
  • On Mac, after extracting the .zip folder, you will likely have to right-click and Open to bypass the unknown developer message.
Possible Updates to Come
  • Pixelated menu font
  • Full credits page
  • Score counter
  • Explosion animations
